sources.title: THE FORBIDDEN CITY ( 1918) Norma Talmadge
sources.description: THE FORBIDDEN CITY (1918) Starring: Norma Talmadge, Thomas Meighan, E. Alyn Warren, Michael Rayle, L. Â Rogers Lytton, Reid Hamilton Directed by Sidney Franklin Produced by Joseph M. Schenck Norma Talmadge Film Corporation/Selznick Pictures William Thomas Sherman, wts@gunjones.com, http://www.mn-hp.com

metadata.Plot: The daughter of a Chinese mandarin is sentenced to death for her secret marriage to an American. Their child, raised in the mandarin's palace, grows up and escapes to seek her father, now a high-ranking official in the Philippines.
metadata.Actors: Norma Talmadge, Thomas Meighan, E. Alyn Warren
